Application.Apps.DAC.app_dac¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

index()

Renders the Landing Page for the Voltage Control APP. Is called with POST/GET Request at / and /home

init_dac()

Initialises a Voltage Card and Multiplexer. Is called with POST Request at /init_dac

set_voltage()

Sets the Voltage.

get_voltage()

Gets the voltage from the specified voltage card.

get_single_voltage()

Gets the voltage from the specified voltage card.

Attributes¶

app_dac

_title

app_dac[source]¶
_title = Voltage Control[source]¶
index()[source]¶

Renders the Landing Page for the Voltage Control APP. Is called with POST/GET Request at / and /home

Returns

The Html Site to be shown

Return type

Rendered html

init_dac()[source]¶

Initialises a Voltage Card and Multiplexer. Is called with POST Request at /init_dac

Returns

Success Statement

Return type

json

set_voltage()[source]¶

Sets the Voltage. Called by POST of /set_dac_value. Request must contain desired voltage as [“voltage”] and channel as [“channel”]

Returns

data contains estimated Voltage of set_voltage of DAC and ADC measured Voltage. In case of Exception 0 for Voltage and Exception str

Return type

json

get_voltage()[source]¶

Gets the voltage from the specified voltage card. At the moment from the single available voltage card. Request must contain desired channel as [“channel”]

Returns

json with voltages as array under voltages

Return type

json

get_single_voltage()[source]¶

Gets the voltage from the specified voltage card. At the moment from the single available voltage card.

Returns

json with voltages as array under voltages

Return type

json
